ValidationRule.description: When the Recent Agreement Type is Bulk or BULK-EMA, then Billing Start Date is required.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
AND(
RecordType.Name = 'Community Connections - Property',
OR( ISPICKVAL(Recent_Agreement_Type__c , "Bulk"), ISPICKVAL(Recent_Agreement_Type__c , "BULK-EMA")),
ISBLANK(TEXT( Billing_Start_Date__c ))
)
ValidationRule.errorMessage: When the Recent Agreement Type is Bulk or BULK-EMA, Billing Start Date is required.
